item.title: [FLINK-22109] Misleading exception message if the number of arguments of a nested function is incorrect
item.description:
Add the following test case to ScalarFunctionsTest to reproduce this issue.

@Test
def myTest(): Unit = {
  testSqlApi(s"IFNULL(SUBSTR('abc'), 'def')", "abc")
}
